text: Need Isabella Garcia for KFC campaign. Budget around $5,289, looking for 3 x Behind-the-scenes content, 3 x Media interview, 1 x 15-second TikTok, 3 x Press release quote, 3 x Instagram post. 3 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs October 2025. Usage rights for 9 months. Engagement period: 4 months.
